Uses of Interface
com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.TranslatorFactory

  • Packages that use TranslatorFactory 
    Package Description
    com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate  
    com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.opt  
    com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.opt.joda  

    • Uses of TranslatorFactory in com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate

      Classes in com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate that implement TranslatorFactory 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ArrayTranslatorFactory
      Translator which can load an array of things.
      class  AsIsTranslatorFactory
      This should be the last translator in the list - the one to try when nothing else wants the type.
      class  ByteArrayTranslatorFactory
      Translates a byte[] to Blob.
      class  CollectionTranslatorFactory
      Translator which can load things into a collection field.
      class  EmbedClassTranslatorFactory<T>
      Translator which can map whole embedded classes.
      class  EnumTranslatorFactory
      Knows how to convert Enums to the datastore String
      class  KeyTranslatorFactory
      Knows how to convert Key objects to datastore-native Key objects and vice-versa.
      class  MapifyTranslatorFactory
      This takes a collection and converts it to a map by letting you select out the key value using a class of your own devising.
      class  MapTranslatorFactory
      Translator which manages an expando-style Map.
      class  NumberTranslatorFactory
      Numbers are funky in the datastore.
      class  RefTranslatorFactory
      Knows how to convert Ref objects to datastore-native Key objects and vice-versa.
      class  SerializeTranslatorFactory
      Loader which can load any serialized thing from a Blob.
      class  SqlDateTranslatorFactory
      The datastore can't store java.sql.Date, but it can do java.util.Date.
      class  StringTranslatorFactory
      Knows how to convert Strings.
      class  TimeZoneTranslatorFactory
      Converts java.util.TimeZone
      class  TranslateTranslatorFactory
      Translator factory which lets users define a custom translator for a field.
      class  URLTranslatorFactory
      The datastore can't store URL, so translate it to a String and back.
      class  ValueTranslatorFactory<P,D>
      Provides a little boilerplate for translators that work on simple atomic types.
      Methods in com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate with parameters of type TranslatorFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TranslatorRegistry.add(TranslatorFactory<?> trans)
      Add a new translator to the list.

    • Uses of TranslatorFactory in com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.opt

      Classes in com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.opt that implement TranslatorFactory 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BigDecimalLongTranslatorFactory
      This a simple strategy for storing BigDecimal in the datastore.

    • Uses of TranslatorFactory in com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.opt.joda

      Classes in com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.opt.joda that implement TranslatorFactory 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BigMoneyStringTranslatorFactory
      Stores BigMoney as its string representation.
      class  DateTimeZoneTranslatorFactory
      Stores a joda DateTimeZone as its String id.
      class  LocalDateTimeTranslatorFactory
      Stores LocalDateTime as a String in ISO8601 format (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSS)
      class  LocalDateTranslatorFactory
      Stores LocalDate as a String in ISO format: yyyy-MM-dd
      class  LocalTimeTranslatorFactory
      Stores LocalTime as a String in ISO8601 format: HH:MM:SS.ZZZZ
      class  MoneyStringTranslatorFactory
      Stores Money as its string representation.
      class  ReadableInstantTranslatorFactory
      Converts Joda ReadableInstants (DateTime, DateMidnight, etc) into java.util.Date
